alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Mitchell County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1015 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Asherville, or 9 miles southeast of Beloit, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Asherville and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Kansas.
